GORGEOUS FABRICS

hand-selected for superior touch, feel and wearability

CREPE

Our flattering crepe fabric has been carefully selected because of its aesthetic properties. It has natural breathability, drape, softness and is less likely to crease. Its stretch properties also give superior comfort in wear.

SILK

Our gorgeous Chinese silk offers the height in luxury and elegance. Silkâ€™s natural properties make it comfortable to wear at any time of the year whilst its aesthetic properties make it drape and handle beautifully.

LEATHER

We have selected the highest quality Italian lambskin leather for our obi belts. It is characterized by its extreme softness and flexibility and comes in a wide colour palette to complement our core fabric range.

FAUX-LEATHER

Our stretch faux leather provides a more maintainable and affordable option to real leather. Soft and supple it adds a touch of sass to any outfit whether as trim or as a whole garment.

SHEER SILK

Our gorgeous Chinese sheer silk offers the height in luxury and elegance. Used in our beautiful printed scarves its natural properties make it drape and handle beautifully.

STRETCH COTTON

Our stretch cotton option provides a soft touch lightweight fabric alternative. Digitally printed with the latest techniques to provide vibrant designs.

FLORAL PRINTS

Our stretch cotton floral print provides a lightweight fabric alternative in a funky colour palette. Digitally printed with the latest techniques to provide vibrant designs.

ZEBRA PRINTS

Our stretch cotton zebra print provides a lightweight fabric alternative in a funky colour palette. Digitally printed with the latest techniques to provide vibrant designs.
